column4: hi. When I resume from hibernate sometimes, the display is corrupt in places (title bars, panel, dialogs). Is there I way I can fix this, some config session? It didn't happen under Lucid, it's something that's only happened since the upgrade to natty.
s/session/setting/
I can reboot to "fix" it, but that's not really a fix.
did you upgrade from Lucid to Maverick first?
yes
good. Just clearing that up :)
lucid -> fully updated lucid -> maverick -> reboot -> natty -> reboot -> fully updated natty -> rebooted since that
I'd like to disable compiz if possible, or whatever's doing the desktop effects stuff (running classic)
when you last unplugged the device, what steps did you take?
none... but there aren't any I can take....
they're DVB usb sticks and keyboard/mouse
have you ever removed it from a system before?
yes
what do you mean by "it" ? (there's 4 usb devices)
ok and did you use the safetly remove option in the OS?
where is this "safely remove option" ?
these are not storage devices
it's two tv tuners ("DVB usb sticks"), a keyboard and a mouse
has it been in a windows system?
mythtv was holding onto one of the DVB devices and locking the usb subsystem
nice find :)
which means if I want to remove them or they break again, I'll need to stop mythtv first (which is a little rubbish, but it appears to be due to a bug in the kernel)
